result.ga: bhailigh na páistí timpeall air
result.orig: bhailigh na páistí timpeall air
result.html: bhailigh na páistí timpeall airThe children gathered around him.
result.ponchtml: ḃailiġ na páistí timpeall airThe children gathered around him.

result.eng: A large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ga: bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh

result.ponchtml: ḃí slua mór daoine bailiṫe timpeall an tí agus dreaċ an ḃróin ar a n-aġaiḋA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
